name: Life of a Save Crystal
description:
We made this game for the Bored Pixels Jam 8 within a week.

Introduction

You slip in the role of a Save Crystal in a traditional role playing game. You are tasked with remembering the items of several Heroes and your only help is a board you can fill with unrelated art assets. If you want to be successful you have to build yourself mnemonic bridges and update it as Heroes constantly change their equipment.

Controls

- left click on a tile in the selection or on the memory board picks it up.

- Another left click on the board puts it down.

- right click with a tile in hand removes it.

- right click on a tile on the board starts a link.

- Another right click on a tile links those tiles together. You can link tiles to remember connections.

- Use q and e to rotate a picked up tile.

Credit

all Sounds, all Music, the font and the background of the puzzle board are from Kenney Game Assets (www.kenney.nl)
